typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_id as string,
		customer_unique_id as string,
		customer_zip_code_prefix as integer,
		customer_city as string,
		customer_state as string,
		age as integer,
		gender as string,
		name as string,
		marital_status as string,
		income as string,
		employement_status as string,
		job_role as string,
		phone_no as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustomerSource
CustomerSource derive(scd_is_current = "YES",
		scd_created_at = currentTimestamp()) ~> addingSCDIsCurrent
